The proposed changes by Gov: Scott Walker, which included limitations on collective bargaining power for public sector unions, were examined to verify the claim.
The letter written by Gov: Walker to public workers, explaining his proposal and stating that police, firefighters, and other specific groups were exempt from the changes, was analyzed.
The campaign ads and endorsements receiv: Walker from the Milwaukee Professional Firefighters Association and Milwaukee Police Association were assessed to determine if these groups supported him in his election bid.
The statements made by Donna Brazile on: This Week with Christiane Amanpour" were examined to verify if she accurately represented the exemption of certain groups from collective bargaining rights.
